case 823: if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You hit the door and u find MONEY in the Crack!!!"); setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((500*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((500*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((250*playerLevel[18]), 18); actionTimer = 12; }

item.title: Need help changing the training room to another room at another place

item.description:
@z4mor4k_m1n1on wrote:

ok if this doesnt work, my bad but here

search for hitdoor until u come across if (objectID == 1531) { actionAmount++; if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You start hitting the Door.."); actionName = "hitdoor"; actionTimer = 5; pEmote = 0x326; }after the last bracket hit enter twice and put this in

if (objectID == 6107) { actionAmount++; if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You start hitting the Door.."); actionName = "hitdoor"; actionTimer = 5; pEmote = 0x326; } this is on testscape so it might work

item.title: Need help changing the training room to another room at another place
item.dc:creator: @moparscape840 moparscape840
item.description:
@moparscape840 wrote:

well ok i decided to move citys on PIMPSCAPE SOURCE but now im having trouble changing dummys

case 6106: if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, objectX, objectY, 3)) { if(actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("you hit the dummy like its ur mom!...."); actionTimer = 20; setAnimation(0x326); addSkillXP((2500*playerLevel[0]), 0); addSkillXP((1500*playerLevel[3]), 3); addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[18]), 18); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } break;

Why isn’t it working please Help

NOTE: you will get auto co-owner on my server!
